column4: India's Reliance  global tech firms to invest $9.3 bln in industrial area
column5: MUMBAI  Feb 18 India's Reliance Industries Ltd and global technology companies will invest 600 billion rupees ($9.34 billion) over 10 years to set up an integrated industrial area in the western state of Maharashtra  the company's chairman Mukesh Ambani said.

column4: Gazit-Globe sells more Regency Centers shares for $101 mln
column5: * Israeli real estate developer Gazit-Globe Ltd said on Sunday it sold another 1.03 percent  or 1.76 million shares  in Regency Centers Corp for $101 million.

column5: MUMBAI  Feb 18 India's Reliance Industries Ltd and global technology companies will invest 600 billion rupees ($9.34 billion) over 10 years to set up an integrated industrial area in the western state of Maharashtra  the company's chairman Mukesh Ambani said.

column4: Japan's Mizuho sees pickup in US M&A lending after tax cut
column5: TOKYO  Feb 19 Japan's Mizuho Financial Group Inc sees a pickup in overseas lending after a slowdown last year in the United States  where a recently enacted corporate tax cut is widely expected to spur mergers and acquisitions (M&As).
